嬒字的基本解释

嬒
huì
肤色黝黑的女子。
古通“荟”。

嬒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》烏外切，去泰，影。］
［《廣韻》烏括切，入末，影。］
(1)女黑色。
(2)通“薈”。兴起。

嬒字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬒； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页272第03
【集韻】烏外切，音懀。【說文】女黑色也。【揚子·方言】嬒，可憎也。　又烏括切，音斡。義同。　又嬻嬒，獸名。其狀如禺，文身善笑。一作幽頞。見【山海經】。

嬒字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
嬒字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Huh
huì
A woman with a dark complexion.
Ancient Tong "Hui".
Huh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guangyun" Wu outside cut, go to Thailand, film. ]
["Guangyun" Wu Kuo cut, enter the end, shadow. ]
(1) Female black.
(2) Through "Hui". Rise.
Huh
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬒; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 272 03
[Ji Yun] Wu is cut outside, sound is stunned. [Said the text] Women are also black. 【Yangtze Dialect】Huh, it's also an abomination.　Wu Kuoqie again, sound mou. The same meaning.　嬻嬒, the name of the beast. It looks like a yu, tattooed and laughable. A quiet battle. See [Shan Hai Jing].
